resources.name: Sass
resources.description: Sass is the most mature, stable, and powerful professional grade CSS extension language in the world.

resources.name: Tailwind CSS
resources.description: Tailwind CSS is a highly customizable, low-level CSS framework that gives you all of the building blocks you need to build bespoke designs without any annoying opinionated styles you have to fight to override.

resources.name: A Quick Tour of ES6 (Or, The Bits You'll Actually Use)

resources.description: Comprehensive guide for building Jamstack sites and home of the global Jamstack community.

resources.name: Laravel Valet
resources.description: Valet is a Laravel development environment for Mac minimalists. No Vagrant, no /etc/hosts file. You can even share your sites publicly using local tunnels.

resources.name: Gatsby
resources.description: Gatsby is a React-based open source framework for creating websites and apps.

resources.name: React Query

resources.name: Wordmove
resources.description: Wordmove is a command line tool that lets you automatically mirror local WordPress installations and DB data back and forth from your local development machine to one or more remote servers.

resources.name: WPGraphQL
resources.description: WPGraphQL is a free, open-source WordPress plugin that provides an extendable GraphQL schema and API for any WordPress site.
